titlestmt.titleproper: Charles J. Clarke railroad ticket collection 1865-1875
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: Charles J. Clarke railroad ticket collection

bioghist.p: Charles J. Clarke was Treasurer of the Star Union Line and the National Line.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of railway passes on various railway lines in the eastern and midwestern United States, issued to Charles J. Clarke. The passes are dated 1865, 1866, 1874 and 1875. Railroads represented include the Pennsylvania Railroad, the United States Mail Line Company, the Richmond and Petersburg Railroad, and the Chicago Rock Island and Pacific Railroad. The collection also includes a membership card to the Allegheny County Humane Society and several business and calling cards.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Collection was given by Arthur Power Dudden.
